SEARCH
Package gw.datatype.impl

Class CurrencyAmountConstraintsHandlerBase

java.lang.Object
gw.datatype.impl.DecimalConstraintsHandlerBase
gw.datatype.impl.CurrencyAmountConstraintsHandlerBase
All Implemented Interfaces:
IDataTypeConstraintsHandler, IDecimalConstraintsHandler, IDelayedConstraintsHandler, IMoneyConstraintsHandler, INumberConstraintsHandler
public abstract class CurrencyAmountConstraintsHandlerBase extends DecimalConstraintsHandlerBase implements IMoneyConstraintsHandler, IDelayedConstraintsHandler
Base class for currency amount datatype constraint handlers. Implements IDelayedConstraintsHandler because it relies on multiple fields (the amount and the currency) being set in order to properly validate.
Author:
pdalbora

    • getScale

      public Integer getScale(Object ctx, IPropertyInfo property)
      Description copied from interface: IDecimalConstraintsHandler
      Gets the scale of values for this datatype. The scale is defined as the number of decimal digits to the right of the decimal point for values of this datatype.
